title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers
text_raw:
2. Regulation 2 of the European Communities (Intra-Community Transfers 
of Defence Related Products) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 346 of 2011) is 
amended, in paragraph (1), by the substitution of the following definition of 
‘Directive’: 

‘Directive’ means Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 6 May 20092 simplifying the terms and conditions of transfers of 
defence-related products within the Community as amended by – 

(a) Commission Directive 2010/80/EU of 22 November 20103 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
(b) Commission Directive 2012/10/EU of 22 March 20124 amending 
Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and of the 
Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 

(c) Commission Directive 2012/47/EU of 14 December 20125 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products,

3 OJ L308, 24.11.2010, p.11

5 OJ L31,31.01.2013, p.43

"Iris Oifigiúil" of 30th May, 2025.

amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
(e) Commission Directive 2014/108/EU of 12 December 20147 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
(f) Commission Directive (EU) 2016/970 of 27 May 20168 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and

(g) Commission Directive (EU) 2017/433 of 7 March 20179 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
(h) Commission Directive (EU) 2017/2054 of 8 November 201710 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products, 
(i) Commission Directive (EU) 2019/514 of 14 March 201911 
amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and 
of the Council as regards the list of defence-related products. 

(j) Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of 
the Council of 20 June 201912 adapting a number of legal acts 
providing for the use of the regulatory procedure with scrutiny to 
Articles 290 and 291 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the 
European Union Commission. 

(k) Directive (EU) 2021/1047 of 5 March 202113 amending Directive 
2009/43/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as 
regards the updating of the list of defence-related products in line 
with the updated Common Military List of the European Union 
of 17 February 2020. 

(l) Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2023/277 of 5 October 
202214 amending Directive 2009/43/EC of 
the European 
Parliament and of the Council as regards the updating of the list 
of defence-related products in line with the updated Common 
Military List of the European Union of 21 February 2022. 

(m) Commission Delegated Directive 

(EU) 2024/242 of 27 
September 202315 amending Directive 2009/43/EC of the 
European Parliament and of the Council as regards the updating 
of the list of defence-related products in line with the updated

text_raw:

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities (IntraCommunity Transfers of Defence Related Products) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of 
the Intra Communities Transfer Directive (Directive 
2009/43/EEC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 6 May 2009) is 
to simplify the rules and procedures applicable to the intra-Community transfer 
of defence related products. 

The list of products covered by Directive 2009/43/EEC is the “EU Common 
Military List”. As the common military list is updated regularly, the Directive is 
also updated with an amended list. These Regulations implement and give effect 
to Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2025/290 of 4 October 2024 to reflect 
the amendments made in the EU Common Military List. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [210]
